name: MrSteam
0:
”Alexa, ask Mr steam to turn on the steam bath”
”Alexa, ask Mr steam to set temperature to eighty degrees”
”Alexa, ask Mr steam to set the time to ten minutes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mr steam
Developer Terms of Use
des: You’re just a few words away from your luxuriating, healthful steam shower. When SteamLinx is installed, MrSteam residential steam shower systems are compatible with Alexa-enabled devices. Whether you’re on the road home, relaxing in your living room or just waking up, your MrSteam SteamShower will be ready when you are. To use the skill, click enable above and sign in with your SteamLinx account to link to your MrSteam SteamShower System. You must have SteamLinx installed and connected to your steam generator and your home router. Note: Only one MrSteam system can be linked at a time. You will be prompted to select a MrSteam system if you have more than one associated with your SteamLinx account. If you have more than one, you will need to alternate between them by disabling the skill and re-enabling/linking it to one of the other spas. If the steps above did not work, verify that the correct account/skill/MrSteam system were used/selected. If they were, disable the skill and try linking it again.
